title: Use Function names to represent Closure Scopes
body:
This feature request has also been proposed
- to the Chromium Web Inspector team:
https://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=493156
- to the Firebug Devtools team:
https://ffdevtools.uservoice.com/forums/246087-firefox-developer-tools-ideas/suggestions/8158806-use-function-names-to-represent-closure-scopes

comments.body:
